review: Dr Harshini helped me with clear understanding of procedure for braces orthodontic treatment, she treated my teeth with issues like Gum infection, debonding, fixed retainers, removable retainers, scaling, dental hygiene that is to be followed during the treatment. I appreciate her work and patience for dealing with a scary patient. Thank you very much for your lovely support throughout the treatment duration.
